data.text: Yahweh said to the people of Jerusalem, “Go up and down every street.
But when people there say, ‘I solemnly declare that as surely as Yahweh lives, I will do what he says,’
Yahweh, you are certainly [RHQ] searching for people who tell the truth.
I thought, “We cannot expect these people to act righteously, because they are poor;
So, I will go and talk to their leaders,
Because of that, lions will come out of the forests and kill them;
Yahweh says, “I cannot [RHQ] forgive these people;
Just like [MET] well-fed male horses neigh, wanting sex with female horses,
◄Should I not punish them for this [RHQ]?/I will certainly get revenge on this nation for this!►
I will say to your enemies, ‘The people of Judah and Israel are like a vineyard.
The people of Israel and Judah have turned away from me completely.’
They have lied about me and said,
What God’s prophets say is nothing but hot air!
So, this is what Yahweh, the Commander of the armies of angels in heaven, has said to me:
Listen to this, you people of Israel:
Their soldiers are all very strong,
They will eat the food that you have harvested from your fields,
But even when those things happen, I will not get rid of all of you.
And when the survivors ask, ‘Why is Yahweh our God doing this to us?’
Yahweh said to me, “Proclaim this to the people of Israel and Judah:
Listen to this, you people who are foolish and who do not have any sense:
Why do you not revere me [RHQ]?
But you people are not like the waves that obey me.
You do not say to yourselves,
It is because of the wrong things that you have done, that those good things have not happened;
Among my people are wicked people who hide along the roads to ambush/attack people
Like a hunter has a cage full of birds that he has captured,
They are big and fat,
So I will certainly [RHQ] punish them for doing those things.
Very appalling/horrible and terrible [DOU] things are happening in this country:
Prophets speak only lies
